short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paste pre-defined notes to input fields

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save frequently used notes on browser and use them for input fields later. Right click on the input field and find the paste notes item in the context menu. Click on the item and it'll copy the pre-defined notes to the input field.

For some browsers, the export might not work. This probably due to an existing extension installed on the computer if the user is using a browser managed by organization.

Known Bugs:
* Doesn't work on most Social Media sites. Will be fixed on next update.
